Hi Roger,Thanks a lot for =C2=A0your reply.I tried testing this on a small =
web app I created.As suggested I removed the Legacy config's and only kept =
the=C2=A0URL-Agnostic Duplication Reduction .I can also see the=C2=A0warcRe=
visit:digest =C2=A0records in the crawl log and it generated a 312 kb warc =
file which played back fine.I ran the crawl once more=C2=A0without changing=
 anything on the site=C2=A0I was expecting the size of the warc to reduce a=
s I had not changed anything on the site and=C2=A0as all the contents were =
already present in the first warc file.=C2=A0but the size of the archieve s=
till remained=C2=A0312 kb.=C2=A0
Is my assumption not correct =C2=A0?
Thank=
s Sandip 

     On Friday, 6 February 2015 3:55 PM, "'Coram, Roger' Roger.C=
oram@... [archive-crawler]" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
   
=

 =C2=A0   Hi Sandip, As far as I=E2=80=99m aware you should definitely be =
using only one of the =E2=80=9CURL-Agnostic Duplication Reduction=E2=80=9D =
or the =E2=80=9CLegacy=E2=80=A6=E2=80=9D version. Although they largely do =
the same thing they behave differently (effectively the newer version keys =
on the checksum, the older keys on the URL+checksum).  =C2=A0 At first glan=
ce your config. looks correct so it might be the inclusion of both the abov=
e causing the issue. During a crawl, if you watch your crawl.log file, you =
should see entries with annotations like =E2=80=9CwarcRevisit:digest=E2=80=
=9D in the last field=E2=80=94that indicates deduplication is working.  =C2=
=A0 Roger  =C2=A0 From: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com [mailto:archive-cra=
wler@yahoogroups.com]
Sent: 06 February 2015 04:07
To: archive-crawler@yaho=
ogroups.com
Subject: [archive-crawler] Heritrix 3.2.0 deduplication [1 Atta=
chment]  =C2=A0 =C2=A0  [Attachment(s) from Sandip Dev included below] Hi, =
I had already posted my questions earlier regarding the issues that I have =
been facing the deduplication.  =C2=A0 Can you please let me know if this i=
s the correct forum where I should post my questions ?  =C2=A0  =C2=A0 I am=
 trying to achieve incremental crawling using Heritrix 3.2.0. However it se=
ems it is always browsing all the URL's even if there is no change. I am at=
taching crawler-beans.xml for the configuration that I am doing. Can anyone=
 suggest what I might be doing wrong ?  =C2=A0 Is the spring bean I have pu=
t the configurations for both    
   - URL-Agnostic Duplication Reduction
 =
  - Legacy Duplication Reduction Configuration
 Can I use both the features=
 at the same time in the config ? I see the archive size remains the same a=
cross multiple crawls even if there is no change . How do I check if the th=
e deduplication is working ?  =C2=A0 Any help will be greatly appreciated a=
s I am desperately tryinjg to get this work :)  =C2=A0  =C2=A0  =C2=A0  =C2=
=A0  =C2=A0 Thanks Sandip Dev  =C2=A0  
=C2=A0
